**Volume 1 of *The Complete Canon of Daoist Doctrines and Rituals*** – *The Ritual of the Original Command of Life by Master Guangting Du*

**Morning Dao Ritual: The Original Command of Life**
The ritual proceedings commence as the altar is ascended in proper form.
The assembled lectors recite the scriptures, each paying homage to their respective teachers in accordance with the Dao.
The High Master (高功) proclaims the protective incantations of the Dao.

The Azure Yang (青阳) radiates its luminous reflection,
Illuminating the sun and returning the spirit.
The Divine Tiger repels malevolence,
The flying celestial beings scatter their bells.
It crushes deceit and extinguishes falsehoods,
Binding all demons in their forms.
The Nine Mysteries (九微) return to the Dao,
The Eight Auras (八威) subdue the vital essence (精).
The Thousand Authentic Ones (千真) verify the records,
The Three Primordials (三元) purify the heavens.

To the left, the Yellow Whistle (啸中黄) invokes,
To the right, the Six Ding (六丁) are summoned.
Seven rotations, eight harmonies,
Circulating the Heavenly Scriptures (天经).

The sacred Dao resounds majestically,
The Great Dao/Way (大道) is set in motion.
Auspicious clouds flow forth,
Converging the radiance of the Yellow Court (黄庭),
In harmony with the Dao/Way’s true essence.

The assembled lectors recite again,
Striking the ritual drum (法鼓) twenty-four times.

The High Master lights the incense burner (发炉).
We invoke the Supreme Three Heavens (三天), the Primordial Origin of the Three Qi (三炁), the Most High Dao Lord (太上道君), and the Most High Old Lord (太上老君), calling forth from within our bodies the thirty-five officials of the Three Five (三五), the left and right envoys, the left and right incense bearers, the courier dragons and mounted officers, the attendants of golden boys and silver girls who scatter words and flowers, and the thirty-six direct symbols of the Five Emperors (五帝), the thirty-six direct-day incense officials (直日香官), and all others who have emerged.

Those who have emerged are clad in solemn and resplendent attire,
Their headgear and sashes adorned with trailing plumes,
Opening the Mystic Altar (玄坛) and summoning the local deities and spirits of the domain (方域神真).

We now present our morning court,
Ascend the altar to perform the Dao Ritual,
And humbly recite our intentions—
Our sincere aspirations are recorded in the heavens,
And we pray that the Most High Ten-Directions True Dao (十方至真道) and the Primordial Qi (一炁) of the Dao,
The luminous treasure of the Venerable Dao (灵宝瑞光),
May descend and flow into our bodies,
So that our efforts may swiftly reach the Most High Dao of the Supreme Extremity (太上无极大道),
The Three Pure Ones (三清) and the Uppermost Saints (上圣),
The Heavenly Sovereign of Jade (昊天玉皇上帝),
The Grand Sovereign of the Purple Cluster (紫微北极大帝),
The Celestial Lord of the Central Dipper (斗中之尊),
The Great Sovereign of the Dipper (天皇大帝),
The Great Lord of the Dipper (斗中之主),
The Purple Cluster Great Sovereign (紫微大帝),
The Northern Dipper High Sovereign (北斗高上玉皇尊帝君),
The Celestial Lord of the Great Constellation (太微玉帝),
The Northern Dipper High Marshal (北斗太尉) of the Yang Brightness and the Greedy Star (阳明贪狼玉晨君),
The Northern Dipper Supreme Steward (上宰) of the Yin Essence and the Giant Gate Star (阴精巨门玉晨君),
The Northern Dipper Grand Administrator (司空) of the True Person and the Storehouse Star (禄存玉晨君),
The Northern Dipper Wandering Attendant (游擎) of the Mystic Darkness and the Literary Music Star (文曲玉晨君),
The Northern Dipper Lord of the Dipper (斗君) of the Red Primordial and the Chaste Star (丹元廉贞玉晨君),
The Northern Dipper High Officer (太常) of the Northern Extremity and the Military Music Star (武曲玉晨君),
The Northern Dipper Heavenly Sovereign (上帝) of the Celestial Gate and the Star of the Broken Army (天关破军玉晨君),
The Northern Dipper Celestial Lord (玉帝) of the Mystic Clarity and the Outer Auxiliary Star (洞明外辅玉晨君),
The Northern Dipper True Sovereign (帝真) of the Hidden Primordial and the Inner Auxiliary Star (隐元内弼玉晨君),
The Dipper’s Celestial Enforcer (天罡) of the Ten-Thousand Authentic and the Commander of the Deluge Star (奎光帝君),
The Nine Sovereigns of the Northern Dipper (北斗九皇夫人),
The Nine Yin Inner Consorts (九阴内妃),
The Three Platforms and the Five Constellations (三台华盖星君),
The Three Officials and Five Emperors (三官五帝),
The Nine Departments and Four Divisions (九府四司),
The Daoist Virtues of the Dipper (斗中道德诸君),
The Saintly Host of the Unbridled (无鞅圣众),
The Sixty Heavenly Stems and Earthly Branches of the Original Command Stars (六十甲子本命星君),
The Great Daoist Master of the Mystic (玄中大法师),
The Great Daoist Masters of the Three Heavens (三天大法师),
The True Persons of the Precious (宝上真人),
The Two Immortal Envoys (二仙使者),
The Nine Palace Officials and Attendants (九宫官属),
And all true spirits (一切真灵).

We have heard that the Great Dao/Way, once divided,
The Primordial Essence (元精) began its operation,
The heavens and earth hung their symbols,
And yin and yang nurtured the spirit.

At its inception, humanity was born,
First emerging among all living beings,
The divine essence coalesced in the Supreme Extremity (太极),
The vital qi condensed in the Heavy Darkness (重玄).
All owe their nurturing to the sacred Dao,
And share in the transformation of the natural world.

We, by fortune, have been granted this life,
And now partake in the human order.
As the Three Mystic Caverns (三洞) open their light
And the Five Sacred Scriptures (五文) unfold their profundity,
We have glimpsed the Mystic Darkness (玄微) through the jade cases and phoenix tablets,
And explored the hidden depths with the phoenix scrolls and dragon chapters.

Yet, though we abide in the world and follow its customs,
As time passes, we have not yet ascended to absorb the clouds and stars of the ten directions,
Nor grasped the divine mists of the celestial valleys.

Only by performing our duties to assist the Original Command (功佐命),
Expanding the Dao and transforming the age (弘道化时),
May we fulfill the Mystic Teachings (玄科),
And hope to manifest the subtle effects (微效).
Moreover, we now present this petition in accordance with the sacred edict—
How dare we not humbly report it?

**Proclamation of the Petition**
As the words of the petition are spoken,
With sincere and earnest devotion.

Today, on the day of my birth and the Original Command of my life,
I devoutly surrender to the Dao,
And solemnly establish this Daoist hall,
To pray for blessings from the Nine Heavens (九天),
And to extend longevity to this very day.
With reverence, I light the incense and focus my thoughts on the true spirits (真灵).

I follow the ten-directional rites of the Azure Court (十华朝会之仪),
And the three-realm incense-burning format (三境焚香之格).

I pray that the Primordial Sovereign (元尊) may descend to inspect,
And that the Ten-Thousand Saints (万圣) may shine their light,
Commanding the Five Emperors (五帝) to gather at the Jade Palace (玉宫),
And summoning all true spirits (群真) to the Eight Extremes (八极).

I open the Red Primordial rank (丹秩) of the Southern Celestial Chant,
And increase blessings and longevity;
I inscribe the Azure script (青文) of the Eastern Dipper,
And flow its auspiciousness to bestow fortune upon all.

Now, in this morning Dao Ritual,
I request the ritual assembly (法众) to take this first pinch of incense and ascend.

All join in offering the incense,
Reaching the Jade Purity Palace (玉清宫),
And pervading the sacred realm of the Jade Purity (玉清圣境),
Forming the Azure Pavilion (华盖),
To venerate the Great Primordial Lord of the Dao (大罗元始尊).

I pray that this incense smoke,
Ascending directly to the heavens,
May venerate the Supreme True Daoist Treasure (无上至真道宝).

We, the disciples,
Surrender our bodies, our spirits, our lives,
And first prostrate ourselves to the ground.

We rely upon the Most High Three Sovereigns (太上三尊),
The Ten-Directions Saints (十方众圣),
And pray that with this pinch of incense’s merit,
The blessings may extend to the spirits of the ancestral temple and the state (社稷尊灵),
The sacred ancestors of the peach (宗桃先圣),
Our spirits may coalesce in the heavens above,
And the blessings descend to the mortal realm (降福人间).
May the Emperor’s longevity mountain endure forever,
The Dipper’s Extremity (辰极) align with the Azure Court (齐华),
And the sun and moon hang suspended to illuminate the ten directions,
The Primordial Harmony (元和) flow to bring peace to the four seas.

May the Empress and the Crown Prince,
Receive eternal blessings of radiant light;
May the civil and military officials,
Spread the imperial designs across the vast ages.

Now, this incense-burning,
Is an act of surrender to the Dao’s Sovereign (道尊) and the Great Saints of the True Dao (大圣众至真之德).

After attaining the Dao,
We may preserve the eternal heavens,
And harmonize with the Dao’s true essence.

Now, in this morning court,
Ascending the altar to perform the Dao Ritual,
We request the ritual assembly (法众) to take this second pinch of incense and ascend.

---

Now, the incense of **Universal Harmony** (眾和香),
Ascends to the **Supreme Purity Palace** (至上清宮),
Permeating all realms of the **Supreme Purity True Dao** (遍上清真境),
Forming a **Treasure Canopy** (成寶蓋),
To offer **nourishment** (供養) to the **Jade Dawn Great Dao Lord** (玉晨大道君).

May this incense smoke,
Ascend directly to the heavens,
To offer **nourishment** to the **Supreme, Most True Scripture Treasures** (無上至真經寶).

We, the subjects, surrender our **bodies** (皈身),
**spirits** (皈神),
And **lives** (皈命),
Prostrating our heads and bodies to the earth.

We humbly rely upon the **Supreme Three Sovereigns** (太上三尊),
And the **Ten Directions’ Saints** (十方眾聖),
May the **merits of this pinch of incense** (是捻香功德),
Flow back to bless the **vegetarian master** (斋主某),
With **Eight Cassias** (八桂) of equal years,
And **Five Mountains** (五山) of equal blessings.

May the **Ten Thousand Immortals** (萬仙) descend with their **auspices** (降佑),
And take the **Golden Elixir** (饵金液) to **calm our spirits** (安神);
May the **Host of Saints** (群聖) return their **radiant light** (回光),
And open the **Jade Scriptures** (開玉書) to bestow **auspicious blessings** (注祿).

The **Nine Mysteries and Seven Ancestors** (九玄七祖),
Ascend in glory to the **Vermilion Mound** (超景朱陵),
And the **Five Clans and Six Relatives** (五族六親),
Are inscribed upon the **Crimson Tablets** (列名丹簡).

Now, this incense-burning,
Is an act of surrender to the **Scripture Sovereign** (經尊) and the **Great Saints of the True Dao** (大聖眾至真之德).

After attaining the Dao,
We may preserve the **eternal heavens** (永保長存),
And harmonize with the **Dao’s true essence** (和與道合真).

---

With the incense of **Universal Harmony** (眾和香),
Ascending to the **Great Purity Palace** (至太清宮),
Permeating all **Great Purity Daoist Realms** (遍太清仙境),
Forming a **Cloud Canopy** (成雲蓋),
To offer **nourishment** to the **Five Spirits’ Mysterious Elder Lord** (五靈玄老君).

May this incense smoke,
Ascend directly to the heavens,
To offer **nourishment** to the **Supreme, Most True Master Treasures** (無上至真師寶).

We, the subjects, surrender our **bodies** (皈身),
**spirits** (皈神),
And **lives** (皈命),
Prostrating our heads and bodies to the earth.

We humbly rely upon the **Supreme Three Sovereigns** (太上三尊),
And the **Ten Directions’ Saints** (十方眾聖),
May the **merits of this pinch of incense** (是捻香功德),
Flow back to bless the **entirety of Heaven and Earth** (天地之內),
And **universally extend** (普及) to all **living beings** (群生),
With **Nine Nights of Illumination** (九夜開光),
And **Three Realms of Clarity** (三淵朗晏),
To stir the **flying and sinking** (飛沉), **moving and growing** (動植),
All may prosper and fulfill their **nature and destiny** (生成).

Now, this incense-burning,
Is an act of surrender to the **Master Sovereign** (師尊) and the **Great Saints of the True Dao** (大聖眾至真之德).

After attaining the Dao,
We may preserve the **eternal prosperity** (永保利亨),
And harmonize with the **Dao’s true essence** (和與道合真).

**Repentance** (忏方),
**Commanding demons** (命魔),
Three **invocations** (三啟),
Three **salutations** (三禮).

Again, we **recite the sacred ranks** (重稱法位).
The **officiating subjects** (具位臣某),
With the **assembled officials** (與臨坛官眾等),
Solemnly and sincerely **present our invocation** (上启),
To the **Three Pure Ones, Highest Saints** (三清上聖),
The **Ten Extremes of Highest Truth** (十極高真),
The **Celestial Bureau of Immortals** (斗府神仙),
The **True Daoist Ritual Host** (醮筵真宰),
Respectfully **entreat their boundless compassion** (恭望洪慈),
And **pray for their penetrating insight** (洞垂昭鑑).

We, the subjects, have heard that the **Two Qi** (二炁) **converge in harmony** (凝和),
And the **Three Refined Essences** (三靈) **manifest in substance** (表質),
Receiving the **transformation of the Great Dao’s creation** (承大道生成之化),
And the **molding power of the Great Void’s furnace** (鼓太虚陶鑄之功).

Therefore, the **thousand-year cycle** (千年) is the **period of descending saints** (降聖之期),
And the **five-hundred-year span** (五百) is the **number of virtuous births** (生賢之數).
None fail to **embrace the divine essence’s wondrous operation** (禀神妙運),
And **share the splendor of stars, constellations, sun, and moon** (分星辰日月之華);
Or to **manifest virtue and spirit** (纵德诞灵),
And **form the essence of mountains, rivers, and valleys** (結岳渎山川之秀).

Thus, their **merits are proclaimed to benefit all things** (功宣濟物),
And the **Dao flourishes in its timely manifestation** (道葉為時),
Their **compassion extends to all living beings** (恩被生靈),
And their **blessings reach both the manifest and the hidden** (惠覃幽顯).

At this **auspicious order** (令序),
It is fitting to **commence the ritual platform** (宜啟坛場),
To **embrace the boundless blessings** (將拥洪休),
And **entreat the Mysterious Saints** (仰祈玄聖),
Hoping through **sincere prayer** (冀因虔禱),
To **obtain their responsive grace** (俾獲感通).

Following the **Spiritual Treasure’s Bright Methods** (按靈寶明科),
And **unveiling the Dao’s Natural Secrets** (披自然秘格),
We **inscribe the Three Realms of the Heart** (注心三境),
And **surrender to the Ten Heavens of Life** (皈命十天),
With the **lamps’ light like the crane’s flame** (灯分鹤焰之辉),
And the **incense’s smoke like the dragon’s tendrils** (香散龙烟之穗).

The **Jade Tablets** (玉章) **fly with melodious resonance** (飛韻),
And the **Pure Chimes** (清磬) **flow their sound** (流音),
Surrounding the **vast and boundless spaces** (旁周寥廓之間),
And ascending to the **limitless expanse** (上達無何之外).

When the **Three Sovereigns’ ritual is complete** (三尊演既),
We may **increase years within the Jade Calendar** (增年於玉曆之中);
And when the **Host of Saints’ compassion flows** (萬聖流慈),
We may **extend blessings upon the Jade Tablets** (延祚於瑤缄之上).

With the **Nine Elixirs attained** (九丹自得),
All **ten thousand blessings flourish** (萬善咸臻),
The **long tablets inscribed in the Imperial Heart** (長簡帝心),
And the **eternal protection of Heaven’s blessings** (永绥天祿).

May the **Emperor’s Jade Diagram be firmly established** (皇帝瑶圖克固),
And the **auspicious blessings of the Treasure Dao flourish distantly** (寶運遐昌),
May all **ten thousand nations dwell in harmony** (萬國宅心),
And the **Nine Enclosures** (九圍) **conform to the Dao’s transformation** (順化),
With the **stars and constellations aligned in their degrees** (星辰合度),
And the **sun and moon radiant in their purity** (日月貞華).

From the **outermost seas to the central realm** (海外寰中),
All **conform to the Dao of Non-Action** (俱洽無為之道);
And from the **eternal heavens to the enduring earth** (天長地久),
Their **proclaimed merits are unending** (弘宣不宰之功).

All **creatures awaken in clarity** (庶類昭蘇),
And **living beings universally receive blessings** (群生蒙福),
From the **highest Three Realms** (上窮三界),
To the **lowest Nine Yins** (下及九陰),
Their **blessings universally permeate** (惠澤普沾),
And all **equally attain the Domain of Longevity** (同臻壽域).

Above, we **illuminate the Dao Lord’s boundless compassion** (上明天尊大慈之澤),
Below, we **fulfill our subjects’ sincere surrender** (下副臣等皈向之誠).

We **respectfully present this invocation** (謹啟以聞).

The **Knowledge Chime** (知磬) is raised,
And the **twelve vows** (十二願) are proclaimed.

The **Grand Lecture** (都講舉) is begun,
And we **preserve our spirits while burning incense** (存神烧香).

The **High Functionary** (高功) **replenishes the furnace** (复炉).

The **Incense Officials and Envoys** (香官使者),
The **Left and Right Dragon-Tiger Lords** (左右龍虎君),
And the **Attendant Spirits of Incense** (侍香諸靈官),
Shall **now command our subjects to ascend the ritual platform** (當令臣向來早朝升坛行道之所),
Where **Golden Elixir and Azure Jade naturally generate** (自然生金液丹碧),
And **Mushrooms, herbs, and myriad spirits** (芝英百靈) **converge**.

May the **Ten Directions’ Immortal Children and Jade Maidens** (十方仙童玉女),
**Receive the fragrant incense** (接侍蘭煙),
And **transmit our subjects’ sincere invocation** (傳臣向來所啟之誠),
Swiftly and directly to the **Supreme, Boundless, Most True Dao of the Highest Extremity** (至真無極大道),
The **Three Pure Ones of the Three Realms** (三清三境天尊),
The **Heavenly Jade Emperor of the Supreme Void** (昊天玉皇上帝),
And the **Vermilion Axis, Northern Dipper Grand Emperor** (紫微北極大帝御前).

The **Knowledge Chime** (知磬) is raised,
And the **praise is chanted outside the hall** (出堂頌).

We **exit the door** (出戸),
And **proceed to the Six Curtain Hall** (引至六幕堂).

**The Complete Collection of Daoist Ritual Methods** (道門科範大全集) **Volume One concludes**.
**Volume Two begins**.

The **Master Guangcheng** (广成先生) **Du Guangting** (杜光庭) **compiled and edited**
The **Japanese Command Ritual** (生日本命仪)
At **midday Dao practice** (午朝行道),

The **Grand Master** (都讲举) **assembles**,
Each **offers respect to the Teacher** (各礼师) **and holds the mind in accordance with the Law** (存念如法).
The **High Functionary** (高功) **declares the protective spirit incantations** (宣卫灵咒).

The **Elixir Spirits and Vermilion Fire** (丹灵朱火) **blaze with radiant clouds and gusting winds** (炎霞激风).
The **Crimson Wheel** (赤轮) **moves with mighty force** (刚运),
And the **Heavenly Light** (天光) **strikes eight directions** (八冲).
Its **overwhelming might encompasses all** (迸威包罗),
**Transforming the myriad realms** (交变万方).
**Molten gold cascades** (流金豁落),
And **hostile spirits vanish without trace** (群魔灭踪).
**Evil is repelled, demons shattered** (辟奸破妖),
**Illuminating the Primordial Virtue** (明耀元功).
**Golden Talismans summon and command** (金符召制),
**Treading clouds, wielding dragons** (蹑云策龙).
**Hymns of praise resound** (谣歌庆会),
**Flowers scatter through the void** (散花太空).
**Divine transformations unfold** (神化宜运),
**Stabilizing the Four Quarters** (四极安隆).

**Humblest obeisance before the Celestial Sovereign** (伏御帝前),
**None dare be disrespectful** (罔有不恭),
**In perfect harmony with the Dao’s True Essence** (和与道合真).

The **Grand Master** (都讲举) **sounds the Law Drum twenty-four times** (鸣法鼓二十四通).
The **High Functionary** (高功) **ignites the furnace** (发炉).

**The Supreme Three Heavens’ Primordial Originator** (无上三天玄元始三炁),
**The Most High Dao Lord** (太上道君),
**The Most High Venerable Lord** (太上老君),
**Summon forth from within my body** (召出臣身中)
**The Three Five Functionaries** (三五功曹),
**Left and Right Official Messengers** (左右官使者),
**Left and Right Incense Bearers** (左右捧香),
**Dragon-Coursing Postal Officials** (驿龙骑吏),
**Incense-Serving Golden Boys** (侍香金童),
**Flower-Scattering Jade Maidens** (传言散花玉女),
**The Five Emperors’ Direct Talisman Officials** (五帝直符),
**Direct Sunlight Incense Officials** (直日香官),
**Thirty-six each** (各三十六人) **now emerge**.

The **emerging ones** (出者) **adorned in solemn attire** (严装显服),
**Headgear and sashes with trailing ribbons** (冠带垂缨),
**Opening the Mystic Altars and local deities** (关启玄坛土地),
**And the territorial spirit lords** (方域神真).

Now, **at this midday Dao practice** (臣今午朝),
**Ascending the altar to perform the Way** (升坛行道),
**With utmost sincerity I present my heart’s intent** (谨奏为入意),
**My deepest reverence already recorded and heard** (其诸忱悃，已录告闻),
**I pray that the Most High Dao’s Ten Directions’ True Essence** (愿得太上十方至真道炁),
**The Sacred Treasure’s Auspicious Light** (灵宝瑞光) **descend and flow into our bodies** (下降，流入臣等身中),
**That my sincere invocation may swiftly reach** (令臣所启之诚，速达径御)
**The Most High Boundless Dao** (太上无极大道),
**The Three Pure Ones of the Three Realms** (三清三境天尊),
**The Heavenly Jade Emperor of the Supreme Void** (昊天玉皇上帝),
**And the Star Sovereign, the Great Emperor of the Vermilion Axis** (星主紫微大帝御前).

The **Grand Master** (都讲举) **invites the proclamation of ranks** (请称法位).
**The assembled officials and I** (具位臣姓某与合坛众官等),
**With united sincerity, humbly present our invocation** (谨同诚上启) **to:**

The **Polar Star Ancestral Teacher** (斗极祖师),
**The Primordial Heavenly Venerable of the Perfected Dao** (洞真大道元始天尊),
The **Polar Star Patriarch** (斗极宗师),
**The Most High Dao Lord of the Mystic Dao** (洞玄大道太上道君),
The **Polar Star True Teacher** (斗极真师),
**The Most High Venerable of the Perfected Spirit Dao** (洞神大道太上老君),
The **Great Heavenly Venerable of Jade Sovereignty** (玉皇大天尊),
**The Highest Supreme Emperor of the Mystic Vault** (玄穹高上帝),
The **Sovereign of the Polar Center** (斗中之尊),
**The Heavenly Emperor** (天皇大帝),
The **Master of the Polar Center** (斗中之主),
**The Great Emperor of the Vermilion Axis** (紫微大帝),
The **Highest Supreme Jade Emperor of the Northern Dipper** (北斗高上玉皇尊帝君),
The **Jade Lord of the Great Enclosure, the Dawn Star Emperor of Brightness and Greed** (太微玉帝玄卿大帝君),
The **Northern Dipper Grand Marshal, the Dawn Star Emperor of Yin Essence and Giant Gate** (北斗太尉阳明贪狼玉晨君),
The **Northern Dipper Grand Steward, the Dawn Star Emperor of True Person and Longevity** (北斗上宰阴精巨门玉晨君),
The **Northern Dipper Director of Works, the Dawn Star Emperor of Virtue and Storage** (北斗司空真人禄存玉晨君),
The **Northern Dipper Wandering Official, the Dawn Star Emperor of Mystic Darkness and Literary Harmony** (北斗游擎玄冥文曲玉晨君),
The **Northern Dipper Marshal, the Dawn Star Emperor of Crimson Origin and Chaste Integrity** (北斗斗君丹元廉贞玉晨君),
The **Northern Dipper Grand Preceptor, the Dawn Star Emperor of the Northern Extremity and Martial Harmony** (北斗大常北极武曲玉晨君),
The **Northern Dipper Celestial Sovereign, the Dawn Star Emperor of Heavenly Gate and Shattered Army** (北斗上帝天关破军玉晨君),
The **Northern Dipper Jade Emperor, the Dawn Star Emperor of Illuminating Clarity and Outer Aid** (北斗玉帝洞明外辅玉晨君),
The **Northern Dipper Imperial Truth, the Dawn Star Emperor of Concealed Origin and Inner Support** (北斗帝真隐元内弼玉晨君),
The **Celestial Pole’s Martial General, the Commander of Ten Thousand Truths, the Emperor of the Net Star’s Radiance** (斗中天罡万真节度奎光帝君),
The **Nine Sovereigns of the Northern Dipper** (北斗九皇夫人),
The **Nine Yin Inner Consorts** (九阴内妃),
The **Three Enclosures and the Star Sovereign of the Azure Pavilion** (三台华盖星君),
The **Three Officials and Five Emperors** (三官五帝),
The **Nine Ministries and Four Departments** (九府四司),
The **Moral Dao Lords of the Polar Center** (斗中道德诸君),
The **Sixty Heavenly Stems and Earthly Branches Native Stars of the Twenty-Six Celestial Soldiers** (无鞅圣众二六十甲子本命星君),
The **Great Lawmasters of the Mystic** (玄中大法师),
The **Three Heavenly Lawmasters** (三天大法师),
The **Treasure-Bearing True Persons** (宝上真人),
The **Two Celestial Envoys** (二仙使者),
The **Nine Palace Officials and Attendants** (九宫官属),
**All spirit lords and true essences** (一切真灵).

**We humbly hear** (臣等伏闻)
**That the Primordial Originator unfolded the diagram** (元始开图),
**Revealing the secrets of eternal life** (演长生之秘箓);
**That the Mystic Originator expounded the transformation** (玄元阐化),
**And expanded the wondrous gate of universal salvation** (弘广济之妙门).

**Universal blessings extend to all beings, human and celestial,**
**All attaining shared fortune and grace.**
Thus, past sins and karmic entanglements are dissolved,
All may repent and pray—
Even the slightest merit or virtue is fully recorded,
Great and small transgressions and virtues none are omitted.

**Our duty lies in proclaiming and upholding**—
We humbly assist the **Dao’s transformation**,
And for all supplications, how dare we not report them?

**Proclamation:**
As the words declare, sincere devotion is practiced,
Worthy of being inscribed and presented,
Hoping for divine response and communion.

We reflect upon the **Thirty-Six Sacred Scriptures** (三十六部尊经),
Where nurturing life is the foundation;
And the **Twenty-Seven Grades of Ritual Fasting** (二十七等斋法),
Where upholding virtue takes precedence.

Thus, the **Seven Stars of the Native Command** (本命七星) are moved and transformed,
Revealing the **Three Sovereigns’ divine decrees** (三皇监乾之旨),
Permitting the wearing of **Sacred Talismans** (佩宝符),
And the **Celestial Registrar’s records** (司马度籍),
To prolong life through **Great Unity** (延生太一),
And preserve the soul while extending years.

**Primordial Father and Mystic Mother** (元父玄母)
Internally govern the **Hundred Passes** (百关);
**Golden Dawn and Jade Splendor** (金晨玉华)
Externally dispel all malevolence.

**Descending the Radiant Light into the Great Cavern** (降日华於大洞),
**Dissolving karmic bonds in the Three Fields** (解宿结於三田).
Diligently practicing this,
One may ascend as a **Feathered Immortal** (云升羽化),
For the principles of nurturing one’s **Native Command** are recorded in the **True Scriptures** (本命具存修之理，载彼真经);
The **Birthday Scripture of Great Abundance** (生日敷大有之书) clarifies its profound meaning,
The **Celestial Registrar** (司命) reverses the **Ten Absolute Judgments** (回十绝之信),
And the **Primordial Lord** (元君) opens the **Register of Destiny** (开定籍之章).
The **Three Realms** gather in the courtyard,
And **Ten Thousand Spirits** take their ranks.

Then, virtues are recorded, vices censured,
Longevity preserved, life extended.

**Great indeed is the discernment of qi and nurturing of spirit**—
Awe-inspiring to heaven and earth—
The weight of birth,
Honored by the **Sacred Teachings** (圣教所尊).
On this auspicious day,
We must proclaim the **Assembly of Blessings** (申福会),
Thus, with reverence to the **Three Treasures** (三宝),
We aspire to the **Ten Radiant Ones** (十华),
With sincere vows and offerings of incense and flowers,
Turning the **Sutra and practicing the Dao** (转经行道),
Repenting sins and praying for grace,
Following the prescribed rites,
And observing the **Fast of Rectitude** (修斋直).

At this **midday ritual** (午朝),
We ascend the platform to practice the Dao,
And invite the **Assembled Lawful Ones** (法众) to offer this **first incense strand** (初捻上香).
May this incense smoke ascend directly to the heavens,
Nourishing the **Supreme Dao/Way Treasure** (无上至真道宝).

We, with devoted hearts, **take refuge in body, spirit, and fate** (皈身、皈神、皈命),
Prostrating our heads to the earth.

We rely upon the **Three Supreme Ones** (太上三尊),
And the **Ten Directions’ Holy Saints** (十方众圣),
That the merit of this incense strand
May benefit the **State’s Sacred Spirits** (社稷尊灵),
The **Ancestral Lineage of Illustrious Saints** (列圣昭穆),
Ascending to the **Celestial Gate** (神升王阙),
Ranked in the **Jade Palaces** (品列琼宫),
Soaring in the **Upper Clarity** (腾逸驾於上清),
And attaining **Auspicious Distinction at the Great Treasure** (介殊祥於大宝).
May the **Imperial Line flourish** (允昌帝业),
And blessings extend to all beings (遐福群生).

Descendants of **Certain Family, Nine Generations, Seven Ancestral Lines** (某家九世七玄),
Countless generations past and future,
All emerge from darkness to witness the light.
Now, we burn incense,
Taking refuge in the **Dao’s Supreme Saints and True Ones** (道尊大圣众至真之德).
After attaining the Dao,
We shall eternally preserve life,
Harmonizing with the **True Dao/Way** (和与道合真).

At this **midday ritual** (午朝),
We ascend the platform to practice the Dao,
And invite the **Assembled Lawful Ones** (法众) to offer this **second incense strand** (二捻上香).
May this incense smoke ascend directly to the heavens,
Nourishing the **Supreme Sutra Treasure** (养无上，供养无上至真经宝).

We, with devoted hearts, **take refuge in body, spirit, and fate** (皈身、皈神、皈命),
Prostrating our heads to the earth.

We rely upon the **Three Supreme Ones** (太上三尊),
And the **Ten Directions’ Holy Saints** (十方众圣),
That the merit of this incense strand
May flow to **the Present Emperor** (归流今上皇帝).
May the **Imperial Vision endure eternally** (伏冀圣图悠久),
And the **Sacred Destiny extend abundantly** (宝祚延洪),
With the sun’s wisdom ever bright (日并睿明),
And mountains echoing with sacred longevity (山齐圣寿).
The **Consorts and Royal House** radiate auspicious grace (储宫妃后，光赞鸿休).
Ministers remain loyal and steadfast (百辟忠贞),
Supporting the flourishing age (扶持景运),
While the **Three Lights shine harmoniously** (三光融朗),
And the **Six Qi** remain balanced (六炁和平).
Grain and crops flourish abundantly (谷稼滋丰),
Weapons rest in peace (兵戈戢息).
Deep seas are traversed, perilous heights ascended (航深梯险),
Uniting all nations in homage (会万国以朝宗);
Wheels of law and letters unify the **Eight Strings** (车轨书文，总八弦而混一).
The people attain the **Dao** (俗臻有道),
And transformation spreads effortlessly (化洽无为).

Now, we burn incense,
Taking refuge in the **Sutra’s Supreme Saints and True Ones** (经尊大圣众至真之德).
After attaining the Dao,
We shall eternally preserve heavenly life (保天长存),
Harmonizing with the **True Dao/Way** (和与道合真).

At this **midday ritual** (午朝),
We ascend the platform to practice the Dao,
And invite the **Assembled Lawful Ones** (法众) to offer this **third incense strand** (三捻上香).
May this incense smoke ascend directly to the heavens,
Nourishing the **Supreme Master Treasure** (供养无上至真师宝).

We, with devoted hearts, **take refuge in body, spirit, and fate** (皈身、皈神、皈命),
Prostrating our heads to the earth.

We rely upon the **Three Supreme Ones** (太上三尊),
And the **Ten Directions’ Holy Saints** (十方众圣),
That the merit of this incense strand
May flow to **the Ritual Master Certain** (斋主某),
And to his **inner and outer kin** (内姻外族),
All relatives and connections (眷属亲缘),
That they may be **physically and spiritually at ease** (体豫神安),
With abundant blessings and longevity (福隆寿远),
Unscathed by the **Three Calamities** (三灾不染),
And untouched by the **Nine Hardships** (九厄无侵).
May the **House transmit loyal and filial virtues** (家传忠孝之风),
And the **Gate inherit steadfast harmony** (门袭安贞之吉).
Within the **Nine Enclosures** and across the **Entire Realm** (九围之内，率土之中),
May all benefit from **Auspicious Grace** (景贶所资),
And all beings prosper (群生咸泰).

Now, we burn incense,
Taking refuge in the **Master’s Supreme Saints and True Ones** (师尊大圣众至真之德).
After attaining the Dao,
We shall eternally preserve life (永保长存),
Harmonizing with the **True Dao/Way** (和与道合真).

**Repentance, Command Demons, Three Invocations, Three Rituals.**
We reaffirm our **Lawful Stations** (重称法位).

**The humble officials Certain and others** (具位臣某等),
With sincere hearts, humbly petition the **Three Pure Ones, Supreme Saints** (三清上圣),
The **Ten Extremes’ High True Ones** (十极高真),
The **Northern Dipper Celestial Officials** (斗府神仙),
And the **Ritual Banquet’s True Sovereigns** (醮筵真宰).

We have heard that the **Mystic Dao** manifests in scripture,
With the **Three Vehicles expounding teachings** (三乘演教),
The **Supreme True Ones** spread transformation (至真流化),
And universally save all beings, human and celestial (普度人天).
Thus, even the lowly may participate in the **Profound Mysteries** (微生参奉玄奥),
Following the **Sacred Originals** (遵依圣本),
And assisting in the **Mystic Rites** (敷赞玄科),
Hoping to exhaust our **Crimson Sincerity** (罄丹诚),
And aid the **Great Transformation** (用裨鸿化).

Now, the **Ritual Master Certain** reflects:
The **Supreme True Ones** universally bestow salvation (上真弘济),
The **Three Caverns radiate light** (三洞开光),
And all supplications are answered (有感必通),
For they favor only the virtuous (惟善是佑).

Daring to mark this **Native Command’s Birthday** (初诞本命之日),
We extend our **Repentance and Supplication Rites** (伸祈忏之仪),
Bowing before the **Ritual Platform** (稽首法筵),
Opening our hearts to the **Assembled Saints** (披心众圣),
Turning the **Sutra and practicing the Dao** (转经行道),
And praying for blessings and grace (请福希恩).

We humbly pray that the **Three Supreme Ones** (太上三尊),
And the **Ten Directions’ Holy Saints** (十方众圣),
Shine upon the **Three Realms** (倾光三境),
And descend to the **Nine Pure Lands** (回驾九清),
Examining our **Crimson Hearts** (鉴省丹襟),
And flooding us with **Abundant Grace** (滂流洪泽).
Grant us **Boundless Mercy** (降无涯之施),
And **Great Forgiveness** (开大宥之慈).

Pardon **ourselves, Certain** (臣某己身),
And our **six relatives, kin, seven ancestral lines, and all connections** (六亲眷属、九玄七祖、一切亲缘),
From **past kalpas to this day** (历劫以来，至于今日),
For the **Six Senses’ obstructions and afflictions** (六根障恼),
And the **Three Actions’ transgressions** (三业罪条)—
Whether **disobedience to parents, lack of loyalty, cruelty, or injustice** (或不孝不忠，不仁不义),
**Defying heaven and earth** (犯违天地),
**Dishonoring the Three Lights** (秽慢三光),
**Provoking the Divine** (呵忿神明),
**Disrespecting the Four Great Elements** (轻凌四大),
**Indulging in sensual pleasures** (染滞声色),
**Wallowing in worldly luxuries** (耽玩繁华),
**Harming living beings for joy** (伤杀众生，以为快乐),
**Jealousy and suppression of the virtuous** (妬胜己，抑绝贤明),
**Greed and harm to others** (冒利贪财，酷害於物),
**Criticizing the Dao and defaming the True** (评论道德，毁败正真),
**Hypocrisy and deceit** (口是心非),
**Rebellion against superiors and tyranny over inferiors** (罔上凌下),
**Violating the Three Primordial Precepts and the Hundred and Eighty Prohibitions** (犯三元品目、百八十条),
**Endless and boundless offenses** (无边无涯),
**Beyond count or recollection.** (不可忆识).

「In light of today’s repentance and supplication, I humbly beseech the purification and elimination of all sins.

I pray that the **Dao of the Sovereign** (帝道) may flourish and spread, that the world may enjoy peace and prosperity, that the **Three Lights** (三光) be harmonized, and the **Five Celestial Stems** (五纬) follow their natural order. May all people return to the **plain and simple customs** (朴素之风), and may the realm embrace the **culture of universal harmony** (和平之化).

May the **Nine Abysses** (九幽) and the **Nocturnal Palaces** (夜府) all witness the radiance of the **Dao**. May the **Six Paths of Rebirth** (六趣) of diverse beings alike attain the **auspicious blessings** (祯贶) of the **True Dao** (至真).

As for this humble practitioner, **[name] Zhenchuan** and others, may we be adorned with **gold and jade** (金玉齐身), our longevity and blessings extended within (寿禄内延), while calamities and misfortunes be dispelled without (灾凶外息). May our descendants be **loyal and filial** (子孙忠孝), and our households remain in **serene security** (门宇清安). May the **true spirits of the Three Realms** (三界真灵) secretly grant their protection.

Above, we acknowledge the **Sovereign’s boundless grace** (广济之泽), and below, we align with the **sincere devotion** (皈命之诚) of the ministers. We respectfully submit this petition for divine awareness.

**Knowledge of the Auspicious Bell** (知磬举): Twelve Vows (十二愿).
**Comprehensive Lecture** (都讲举): Preserving the Spirit, Burning Incense (存神烧香).
**High Function Reestablishment** (高功复炉).

Let the **Incense Officials and Messengers** (香官使者), the **Dragon and Tiger Officers on either side** (左右龙虎君), and the **Attendant Spirits of the Incense** (侍香诸灵官) command that the place where I formerly performed the **midday Dao rites** (午朝升坛行道) shall spontaneously produce the **Golden Elixir and Azure Immortality** (金液丹碧), as well as **hundreds of sacred herbs and spirits** (芝英百灵). May all the **Dao spirits** (众真) gather here at this incense burner.

May I further vow that the **Ten Directions’ Celestial Children and Jade Maidens** (十方仙童玉女) will attend to the fragrant **orchid mist** (兰烟), and convey the sincerity of my petition directly to the **Supreme Dao of Boundless Extremes** (无极大道), the **Three Pure Ones and Three Realms’ Celestial Sovereigns** (三清三境天尊), the **August Heavenly Jade Emperor** (昊天玉皇上帝), and the **Grand Sovereign of the Purple Cluster and Northern Pole** (紫微北极大帝) before them.

**Knowledge of the Auspicious Bell** (知磬举): Exiting the Hall to Chant Praises (出堂颂).
**Exiting the Household** (出户): Proclaiming the **Lecture of Ultimate Perfection** (弘至六幕堂).

**Evening Dao Ritual**

The Grand Master presides, all disciples observe the precepts in accordance with the Dao.
The High Functionary proclaims the Sacred Spirit Incantations.

The Five Stars shine resplendent, auspicious *qi* ascends in flight.
The Primordial Sovereign gathers the divine—heaven and earth complete their cycles.
Jade talismans and sacred seals resound; their commands penetrate the deepest mysteries.
Flames are hurled, their might proclaimed—wickedness and calamity are annihilated without trace.
Ten thousand demons are subdued; their chaotic forms dissolve and vanish.
Monstrous evils are crushed, Dao *qi* circulates universally.
Divine radiance illuminates the night—all darkness is dispelled.
Ten thousand spirits descend in ranks; celestial banners ride the winds.
All living beings prosper; blessings extend across the land, harmonizing with the True Dao.

The Grand Master raises the incense burner.
The Supreme Three Heavens’ Primordial Sovereign of the Three *Qi*, the Great Dao Lord of the Void and the Formless, summons forth from within our bodies the Three Five Functionaries, the Left and Right Officials, the Left and Right Incense Bearers, the Relay Dragon Cavalry, the Golden Boys Attending Incense, the Flower-Scattering Jade Maidens, the Five Emperors’ Direct Talismans, the Direct-Day Incense Officials—thirty-six each—now emerging.

The assembled bear their resplendent robes and official insignia, their caps and ribbons adorned, as they open the Mysterious Altars to the Celestial Sovereigns and True Ones. Let them now urgently summon the local land and territorial deities, the True Officials and Upright Spirits of this place.

Now, in this evening Dao ritual, ascending the altar to perform the Way, I humbly present my sincerest petition, my deepest devotions already recorded and conveyed. May the Supreme Ten Directions’ True Dao *qi* and Sacred Treasure Radiance descend, infusing our bodies, so that my petition’s sincerity may swiftly reach the presence of the Supreme True Dao of Boundless Extremes, the Three Pure Ones and Three Realms’ Celestial Sovereigns, the August Heavenly Jade Emperor, and the Star Sovereign, the Purple Cluster Emperor.

The Grand Master raises the incense burner, requesting the proclamation of the Law’s rank.
The undersigned, [Name], together with the assembled ritual congregation, humbly and sincerely petition:

The Ancestral Master of the Pole Star, the Sovereign of the Primordial Dao, the Primordial Heavenly Sovereign of the True Essence;
The Pole Star Patriarch, the Sovereign of the Mysterious Dao, the Supreme Dao Lord;
The Pole Star True Master, the Sovereign of the Divine Dao, the Supreme Lord Lao;
The Jade Emperor, the Supreme Heavenly Sovereign of the Mysterious Vault;
The Central Sovereign of the Pole, the Heavenly Emperor;
The Central Master of the Pole, the Purple Cluster Emperor;
The High Supreme Jade Emperor of the Northern Pole;
The Jade Emperor of the Azure Enclosure, the Supreme Lord of the Mysterious Court;
The Northern Pole Marshal, the Greedy Wolf’s Jade Dawn Lord;
The Northern Pole Chancellor, the Obscure Precision’s Giant Door Jade Dawn Lord;
The Northern Pole Minister of Works, the True Person of Longevity, the Jade Dawn Lord;
The Northern Pole Wanderer, the Mysterious Darkness’s File Star Jade Dawn Lord;
The Pole Star Lord, the Dan Yuan’s Chaste and Upright Jade Dawn Lord;
The Northern Pole Grand Master, the Heavenly Gate’s Breaking Army Jade Dawn Lord;
The Pole Star Emperor, the Illuminating Outer Assistant Jade Dawn Lord;
The Pole Star True Emperor, the Hidden Primordial Inner Jewel Jade Dawn Lord;
The Central Pole’s Ten Thousand True Generals, the Deluge Light Emperor;
The Nine Sovereigns of the Northern Pole;
The Nine Yin Inner Consorts;
The Three Enclosures’ Star Lords of the Azure Pavilion;
The Three Officials and Five Emperors;
The Nine Ministries and Four Departments;
The Moral Dao Lords of the Pole;
The Saintly Crowd of the Unbridled;
The Sixty Heavenly Stems and Earthly Branches of Native Stars;
The Great Law Masters of the Mysterious;
The Three Heavenly Law Masters;
The True Persons of the Precious;
The Two Celestial Envoys;
The Nine Palace Officials;
All True Spirits.

I have heard: the *virtue* of heaven and earth is called *generation*; the Dao that prolongs life is supreme.
The great blessings of the *Hong Fan* are called *longevity*; the True Essence that preserves life is most refined.

Thus, the **Great Dao** descends in scripture, the **True Essence** expounds in teaching;
To prolong life and preserve longevity, to enrich the state and secure its people.

Your servants, having received the **True Vehicle**,
Dwell within the **Dao Domain**,
Donning the seals of the **Eight Assemblies** and **Nine Lights**,
Beholding the **Jade Registers** and **Celestial Scriptures**,
All are proclaimed across boundless eons,
Flowing from the **Primordial Heaven**,
Containing the principles of state pacification,
And the chapters on self-cultivation for prolonged life.

Yet, we dwell in the dusty world,
Harmonizing our **qi** as we traverse land and sea,
Only desiring to spread and extol,
To manifest even the slightest merit.

For whatever we may present,
It should be properly recorded and submitted;
How much more so when we receive imperial edicts—
How dare we not report them above?

**Proclamation of Words.**

According to the words spoken,
It is fitting to submit them to the highest authority.

For on the day of our birth and **Native Star**,
Our hearts yearned for fragrant incense,
Devoutly opening the **Law Altar**,
Diligently observing **fasting and purity**,
Polishing the **Three Pure Ones'** sacred tablets**,
Unfolding the **Three Enclosures'** ancient scrolls**,
Studying the **Great One**’s talismans,
And the **Five Spirits'** essential registries,
All with concentrated minds in **Three Realms**,
Devoted thoughts ascending to the **Supreme Mysteries**,
Seeking to receive from the **Primordial Heaven**,
To revere the **Great Dao**,
To pray for mutual resonance and alignment with **True Spirits**,
To purify our thoughts and wash our hearts,
To earnestly trust in the **True Auspices**.

In this evening’s **Dao Assembly**,
Ascending the altar to practice the **Way**,
We request the **Law Assembly** to perform this **first offering of incense**,
May this incense smoke ascend straight to the heavens,
To venerate the **Supreme True Dao Treasure**.

Your servants, **returning body, returning spirit, returning life**,
Prostrate ourselves with heads to the ground.

We rely upon the **Supreme Three Sovereigns**,
The **Ten Directions’ Holy Saints**,
May the merit of this incense offering
Ascend to benefit the **Altars of Land and Grain**,
The **Sacred Spirits** of the **Heavenly Court**,
To dwell in **Jade Capital**,
To spread blessings and **Precious Auspices**,
To achieve great prosperity,
To broadly bestow fortune upon all beings.

The **seventh ancestor of the Nine Mysteries**,
Ascended to **True Perfection** and **Dao Attainment**,
Refined the **Divine Elixir** at the **Celestial Pass**,
Transcended the **Mysterious Yin**,
In the **Three Realms** and **Ten Directions**,
All attain supreme blessings.

Thus, we now burn incense,
**Returning in devotion** to the **Dao Sovereign’s** **True Saints**,
After attaining the **Way**,
Forever safeguarding our **long abiding**,
In harmony with **Dao and True Essence**.

In this evening’s **Dao Assembly**,
Ascending the altar to practice the **Way**,
We request the **Law Assembly** to perform this **second offering of incense**,
May this incense smoke ascend straight to the heavens,
To venerate the **Supreme True Scripture Treasure**.

Your servants, **returning body, returning spirit, returning life**,
Prostrate ourselves with heads to the ground.

We rely upon the **Supreme Three Sovereigns**,
The **Ten Directions’ Holy Saints**,
May the merit of this incense offering
Ascend to bless the present emperor,
Humbly hoping his **enlightened vision** may flourish eternally,
His **sacred life** extend far and long.

With the **Golden Mirror** held low to survey,
All under heaven shall know **Great Harmony**;
With the **Pearl Tassels** adorned in solemn dignity,
The **Eight Seas** shall be serene and clear.

Morning shall have **loyal and sincere** officials,
Common folk shall attain **wealth and longevity**.
The **Empress and Consorts** shall be reserved,
Assisting in the **auspicious period** of prosperity,
Princesses and **Noble Kings**,
Shall be kept in **peace and good fortune**.

Beyond the **Fire Rat** and **Dragon Torch**,
**Jade and gold** shall vie in swift procession;
In the lands of **Yu Spring** and **Meng Valley**,
**Carriages and documents** shall flow as one.

---

Now, the present offering of incense,
From the **virtue/power** of the **Enlightened Ones**—the **Great Saints**, the **Supreme Experts**, and the **True Ones**—whom we have taken refuge in.

After attaining the **Dao/Way**,
We shall forever safeguard eternal existence,
And align our harmony with the **True Way**.

In this evening’s solemn assembly,
We ascend the platform to practice the **Dao/Way**,
And invite the **Dharma Assembly** to perform these three incense offerings.
May this incense smoke ascend directly to the heavens,
And pay homage to the **Supreme True Teacher Treasure**.

We, the subjects, take refuge in body, mind, and **sacred life**,
And prostrate ourselves with our heads to the ground.

Relying on the **Supreme Three** and the **Ten Directions’ Saints**,
We humbly pray that the **virtue/power** of these incense offerings
May flow back to the **Sacrificial Host** of the certain household,
To themselves, their descendants, and all kin—both inner and outer—
That their **wealth and longevity** may be extended,
Their sins and blemishes purged,
Their calamities and misfortunes dispelled,
Their blessings and auspicious signs abundantly attained,
And that this grace may universally reach all beings—human and celestial—
Sharing equally in immense blessings.

Now, this offering of incense,
From the **virtue/power** of the **Teacher Treasure**—the **Great Saints**, the **Supreme Experts**, and the **True Ones**—whom we have taken refuge in.

After attaining the **Dao/Way**,
We shall eternally safeguard eternal existence,
And align our harmony with the **True Way**.

Repentance for all directions,
Subduing the **Life-Destroying Demon**,
Three invocations, three obeisances.

The **Grand Lecture** commences, and we solemnly recite the **Dharma Rank**.
We, the subjects of certain rank, along with the officials present at the platform,
With utmost sincerity, humbly prostrate ourselves,
And pray to the **Supreme Three**, the **Ten Directions’ Saints**, the **Highest Truths** of the **Ten Extremes**,
The **Martial Celestial Bureaus**, the **Divine Hosts of the Sacrificial Feast**,
And the **True Sovereigns of the Ritual Banquet**,
To behold their boundless compassion,
And to penetrate our earnest supplications with their radiant insight.

We, the subjects, hear the **True Transmission** of the **Ten Thousand Saints**,
And the **Supreme Three’s** solemn teachings,
Which prioritize **saving lives** and **preserving sacred life**,
And uphold the **orthodox Dharma** above all.

From the **Three Caverns’ Treasure Sutras**,
The **Arcane Intentions of All the Heavens**,
Some inwardly cultivate and close their vision,
Swallowing light to nurture the **Primordial Essence**;
Some refine **elixir** with **jade dew** and **jade frost**,
Using **five metals** and **nine cauldrons**;
Some **conserve the spirit** and **consume the qi**,
Restraining the **soul** and binding the **spirit**;
Some **ascend with steps** and **vanish their form**,
Hiding in the heavens and concealing beneath the earth.

All seek to prolong their finite existence,
And create the boundless beyond,
So that the **short-lived** may join the **long-lived**,
And the **morning mushrooms** may rank with the **great cypress trees**,
With all **thousand-gated virtuous beings** enticed to refine their essence.

Some, though foolish, grasp the **tale of capturing shadows**,
While the **superior sages** attain the **effect of diligent practice**,
Clarifying the essential teachings—both ancient and modern—
Which all must follow.

Now, the **Sacrificial Host** of the certain household,
By nature endowed with **orthodox truth**,
Aspires to the **profound mysteries**,
And comprehends the **principles of Dao/Way-body cultivation** and **generation**.
At the moment of their birth, when their **original sacred life** was first bestowed,
They now begin this **ritual assembly** of **burning incense**,
Devoting their minds to the **Ten Extremes**,
Prostrating before all the heavens,
And turning the **sutras** while praying for the **True Ones** and seeking blessings.

We, the subjects, accordingly gather and follow,
Adhering to the prescribed rituals,
And with sincerity, we pray to the **Supreme Three’s** boundless grace.

Humbly hoping that the **Supreme True Saints**,
The **Highest Exalted Ones** without limit,
May look down upon our petition,
And shower us with their **auspicious blessings**,
Granting us the **Vermilion Palace** and **Jade Gate**,
And the **Celestial Hall of Literary Splendor**.

May **Han Jun** open the **scroll of longevity**,
And **Sima Xi** record the **register of eternal life**.
May the **True Spirits** guard and protect,
And may **harmony** be our only resource.

The **right official** shall shorten the **scriptures of premature death**,
And the **left official** shall simplify the **calculations of extended life**.
May our **luck and lineage** be ever-broadened,
Our **sins and karmic debts** forever erased,
Our descendants and kin **prosper and content**,
And both the **living and the dead** **thrive in peace**.

We further pray for the **Ten Thousand Years of the Emperor**,
For the **Altars of Earth and Grain** to remain secure,
For distant lands and foreign courts
To share the same scriptures and follow the same paths,
For the **Three Lights** to shine brightly and long,
For the **Six Qi** to spread in perfect harmony,
For crops to flourish and **Dragon Spirits** to aid in their growth,
For no **diseases or epidemics** in the year,
For the people to live in **contentment and prosperity**,
And for the **Night Capital** and **Passage of the Dark Waters**,
The **Three Realms** and **Six Paths**,
To be blessed with the **extinguishing of suffering**,
And the **opening of the path by celestial light**,
So that all may emerge from darkness,
And be fully granted ascension and enlightenment,
Reaching the **Ten Extremes** and extending to the **Nine Enclosures**,
And all **sentient beings—mobile, stationary, and spiritual**—
May together ascend to the **Realm of Longevity**.

Above, we honor the **Great Heavenly Sovereign’s** boundless compassion,
Below, we fulfill our subjects’ **sacred life** of sincerity.

Respectfully submitted for your knowledge.
**Knowledge of the Ritual Bell**—the **Twelve Vows** are fulfilled.

The **Grand Lecture** commences—**preserving the spirit** while burning incense**.
The **High Functionary** restores the altar.

The **Incense Officials** and **Messengers**,
The **Dragon-Tiger Lords** to the left and right,
And the **Attendant Spirits** of the incense,
Shall direct us to the place where we previously ascended the platform in the evening assembly,
Where naturally arise **Golden Elixir** and **Lapis Lazuli Green**,
**Mushrooms and herbs**, and countless **spiritual beings**,
As the **True Ones** gather in assembly,
Right before this incense burner.

May all **Ten Directions’ Celestial Maidens and Immortal Boys**,
Attending with **orchid-scented incense**,
Transmit our previous supplications in earnest,
Swiftly reaching the **Supreme True Dao/Way** without limit,
The **Three Pure Ones** and **Three Realms** of the **Heavenly Sovereigns**,
The **August Heavenly Jade Emperor**,
The **Grand Sovereign of the Purple Forbidden Enclosure**,
And the **Great Emperor of the Northern Dipper**,
Before their **Celestial Court**.

**Knowledge of the Ritual Bell**—the **chant of departure** is sung.
Departing the hall, we lead the way to the **Six Canopy Hall**.

**Morning Dao/Way Practice on a Pure Dawn**
The ritual assembly ascends the platform as prescribed.

The **Grand Master** raises the **Ritual Bell**, and all disciples bow in reverence, holding their thoughts in accordance with the Dao/Way.
The **High Functionary** proclaims the **Soul-Guarding Incantation**, while **Pure Yang’s Radiance** shines forth, illuminating the sun’s return.
The **Divine Tiger** banishes malevolence, and **Flying Celestials** toll their bells.
**Wickedness is crushed, trials extinguished**—ten thousand demons are bound in form.
The **Nine Mysteries** restore the Dao/Way, and the **Eight Awe-Inspiring Powers** gather essence.
A thousand **Perfected Ones** register their presence, while the **Three Primordial Cycles** purge the pure.
The **Left Whistle** summons **Central Yellow**, and the **Right Baton** commands the **Six Ding**.
Through **Seven Revolutions and Eight Unions**, they circulate the **Heavenly Scriptures**.
The **Sacred Transformation** stands majestic, and the **Great Dao/Way** is set in motion.
**Auspicious Clouds** flow abroad, converging with the **Yellow Court**, harmonizing with the **True Dao/Way**.

The **Grand Master** raises the **Ritual Bell**, and the **Law-Drum** is struck **twenty-four times**.
The **High Functionary** ignites the furnace.

**Supreme Three Heavens’ Primordial Originator of the Three Qi**, **Most High Dao/Way Lord**, **Most High Venerable Laozi**—
Summon forth from within our bodies the **Three Five Functionaries**, the **Left and Right Official Envoys**, the **Left and Right Incense-Bearers**, the **Relay Dragon Mounted Officials**, the **Golden Boys Attending Incense**, the **Jade Girls Scattering Flowers**, the **Five Emperors’ Direct Symbols**, and the **Direct Sun Incense Officials**—each **thirty-six in number**—to emerge.

Those who emerge are clad in solemn, resplendent robes, their headgear adorned with trailing plumes.
They open the **Mysterious Platform’s Earthly Sovereigns and Territorial Spirits**.

Now, at this early court, ascending the platform to practice the Dao/Way, I humbly present my sincerest intentions.
All my earnest aspirations have been recorded and heard.
May the **Most High’s Ten Directions’ Supreme True Dao/Way Qi** and **Numinous Treasure Radiance** descend, flowing into our bodies,
So that my supplications may swiftly reach the **Supreme Limitless Dao/Way**, the **Three Pure Ones of Highest Sanctity**, and the **Heavenly Sovereign Emperor of Jade Sovereignty** before their Celestial Court.

The **Grand Master** raises the **Ritual Bell**, and the **Law-Position** is invoked.

We, **Position-Holding Officials** [here insert name] and the assembled ritual officers,
Humbly together present our sincere petition to:
**Primordial Heavenly Sovereign of Natural Spontaneity**, **Supreme Limitless Dao/Way’s Most High Dao/Way Lord**, **Most Holy Ancestor, Highest Dao/Way Sovereign of the Golden Threshold’s Primordial Heavenly Emperor**, **Most High Venerable Laozi**, **Highest Jade Sovereign**, the **Ten Directions’ Perfected Saints**, the **众至真 (Multitudes of Supreme Truths)**, the **诸君丈人 (Venerable Lords)**, the **Thirty-Six Heavenly Emperors**, the **Jade Emptiness Sovereign**, the **Great Sovereign**, the **East Hua, South Pole, West Spirit, North Truth, Mysterious Capital, Jade Capital, Golden Threshold, Seven Treasures, Mysterious Platform, Purple Micro’s Upper Palace**, the **Numinous Treasure’s Supreme True Manifest Dao/Way Lord**, the **Great Lawmaster of the Mysterious Core**, the **Three Heavens’ Great Lawmasters**, the **Upper Clarity, Sun-Moon, Nine Luminaries, Southern Asterism, Northern Dipper Star Sovereigns**, the **Three Officials and Five Emperors**, the **Nine Departments and Four Bureaus**, the **Moral-Dao Sovereigns within the Dipper**, the **Saintly Crowd of the Unbridled**, the **Sixty Heavenly Stems and Earthly Branches Natal Star Sovereigns**, the **Eastern Peak’s High Chancellor**, the **True Sovereign of Life’s Command**, the **Total Perfected King of the Western Extremity**, the **Mountain-Cave Perfected Immortals**, the **Three Realms’ Responsive Spirits**, and **All True Essences**.

I have heard that the **Wondrous Root of Spontaneity** establishes transformations through circumstances,
Crafting Heaven and Earth, containing the void’s essence.
The sun and moon thereby emit their light, and the **Heavenly Stem and Earthly Branch** take their positions.
The **Heavenly Primordial and Earthly Treasury** govern the **Yang Officials and Yin Attendants**, distributing myriad spirits to rule all beings.
To **remove calamities and bestow blessings**, the **River Chart’s** clear decrees were revealed;
To **repent transgressions and seek mercy**, the **Great One** established the **Expiatory Offerings**.

Our duty lies in **opening salvation and broadly aiding**—first among these is **relief for the afflicted**.
Whatever is petitioned must logically be reported.
How much more so when we receive imperial edicts—how dare we fail to present them?
**The Edict is Proclaimed.**

As the words state, our sincerity is **crimson and sincere**.
Your disciple [here insert name], seeing that **auspicious and inauspicious fortunes alternate**, that **cold and heat shift**, that **prosperity and adversity are not constant**, and fearing **disasters that cling like shadows**, dares to rely on Your benevolent teachings and prepare this ritual platform.

Following the **Yellow Register’s Numinous Treasure Simplified Chapters** and examining the **Mysterious Capital’s Canonical Models**, we hope that through this exposition, we may attain **responsive communion**.

Now, on this pure dawn, ascending the platform to practice the Dao/Way,
We request the **Law-Assembly** to kindle this **first incense-stalk** and offer it aloft.
May this incense-smoke ascend directly to heaven, **supplying the Supreme True Dao/Way Treasure**.
We **repent our bodies, repent our spirits, repent our fates**, prostrating our heads to the earth.

We rely upon the **Most High Three Sovereigns** and the **Ten Directions’ Multitudes of Saints**,
Wishing that the merit of this incense-stalk may flow into the **Imperial Diagram’s Grand Enterprise**,
The **Altar’s Sacred Spirits**, harmonizing with the Dao/Way without end, **aligned with Heaven and eternal**.
May the **Emperor’s Sacred Virtue** transcend the **Three Five**,
Spreading the Dao/Way throughout the **Nine Enclosures**;
May his **auspicious destiny** surpass **a hundred thousand years**,
Extending **non-action** across the **ten thousand realms**.

Now, we burn this incense and **humbly take refuge in the Dao/Way’s Perfected Saints and Supreme Truths**.
After attaining the Dao/Way, we shall **preserve Heaven’s longevity**, harmonizing with the **True Dao/Way**.

With this early court, ascending the platform to practice the Dao/Way,
We request the **Law-Assembly** to kindle this **second incense-stalk** and offer it aloft.
May this incense-smoke ascend directly to heaven, **supplying the Supreme True Scripture Treasure**.
We **repent our bodies, repent our spirits, repent our fates**, prostrating our heads to the earth.

We rely upon the **Most High Three Sovereigns** and the **Ten Directions’ Multitudes of Saints**,
Wishing that the merit of this incense-stalk may flow into **[household’s] Nine Mysterious Subtle Qi** and **a hundred kalpas’ karmic ties**,
Riding the **Primordial Sovereign’s Nine Celestial Petitions** to open the **Nine Abysses**;
Bearing the **Mysterious Sage’s Five Illuminations**, we shall **tranquilize the Five Sufferings**.
Blessings and misfortunes alike shall be preserved, and auspicious influence shall extend far and wide.

Now, we burn this incense and **humbly take refuge in the Scripture’s Perfected Saints and Supreme Truths**.

**Accumulated calamities and grievances** shall be washed away by Your grace;

Below, we **fulfill our disciples’ repentance and gratitude**.

**Late Evening Dao Ritual for Expiation and Warding of Illness**
*Compiled and Edited by Master Guangting Du*

**Ritual Procedure:**
The late evening Dao ritual is performed as prescribed.
The Grand Master raises the ceremonial staff; all disciples pay homage in memory of the Master according to the law.
The High Functionary proclaims the Sacred Protection Incantation.

Five stars radiant, auspicious *qi* ascends in flight.
The Primordial One gathers the numinous—heaven and earth exchange their cycles.
Jade talismans and sacred seals are invoked; their commands pierce the unseen.
Fire is hurled, might is displayed—wickedness and malevolence are annihilated.
Ten thousand demons are subdued; chaotic forces dissolve.
Monstrous evils are crushed; Dao *qi* circulates universally.
Divine light illuminates the night; all obscurity is dispelled.
Ten thousand spirits descend in order; their banners ride the winds.
All living beings prosper; blessings spread across the land, harmonizing with the True Dao.

The Grand Master raises the staff; the law-drum is struck twenty-four times.
The High Functionary ignites the furnace.

**Invocation of the Celestial Host:**
The Most High Three Heavens’ Primordial Originator of the Three *Qi*,
The Supreme Dao Lord of the Void and the Boundless,
Summons forth from within our bodies the Three Five Functionaries,
Left and Right Officials and Messengers,
Left and Right Incense-Bearers,
Dragon-Courier Scribes,
Attendant Golden Boys,
Speaking Maidens who scatter flowers,
The Five Emperors’ Direct Talismans,
Direct-Sun Incense Officials—
Each thirty-six in number—
To emerge in resplendent attire, headdresses adorned with trailing plumes,
Opening the Mystic Altars of Heaven and Truth,
To urgently summon this land’s territorial and domainal spirits,
True Officials and Upright Gods,
To ascend and open the passways.

**Petition of the Disciple:**
This disciple, in the late evening ritual, ascending the altar to practice the Dao,
Humbly presents our sincere intentions—our deepest aspirations already recorded and heard.
We pray that the Supreme Dao’s ten-directional numinous *qi* and Sacred Treasure Light descend,
Flowing into our bodies, so that our supplications may swiftly reach
The Supreme, Boundless Dao of Highest Truth,
The Three Pure Ones, the Celestial Jade Emperor—
Before their august presence.

The Grand Master raises the staff; the law-position is proclaimed.

**The Petition of Officials and Assembled Daoists:**
We, officials of the rank [blank] and the gathered Daoist assembly,
Humbly unite in sincere supplication to:
The Primordial Heavenly Venerable of Natural Spontaneity,
The Supreme Dao Lord of the Boundless,
The Highest Ancestral Sage of the Golden Threshold’s Mystic Primordial Heavenly Emperor,
The Supreme Venerable Laozi,
The Highest Jade Emperor,
The Ten-Directional Perfected Saints,
All the Most True Ones,
The Thirty-Six Heavenly Sovereigns,
The Jade Void Supreme Emperor,
The Jade Emperor,
The Sovereigns of Eastern Clarity, Southern Polarity, Western Spirit, Northern Truth,
The Mystic Metropolis, Jade Capital, Golden Threshold, Seven Treasures, Mystic Platform, Purple Micro—
The Sacred Treasure Most True Clear Sovereign of the Dao,
The Celestial Lords of Sun, Moon, Nine Luminaries, Southern Asterism, Northern Dipper,
The Three Officials and Five Emperors,
The Nine Departments and Four Bureaus,
The Moral Worthies of the Central Dipper,
The Saintly Host of the Unbridled,
The Sixty Heavenly Stems and Earthly Branches of Native Stars,
The Great Lawmasters of the Mystic,
The Three Heavenly Lawmasters,
The Eastern Peak High Chancellor,
The True Lord of Life’s Command,
The Supreme Sovereign King of the Western Extremity,
The Perfected Immortals of Sacred Mountains and Caverns,
The Three Realms’ Responsive Spirits,
All True and Numinous Beings.

**The Disciple’s Declaration:**
We have heard that the Primordial One formed the cosmos,
The One Essence congealed the light—
Heaven and earth received their authority,
Yin and yang moved to generate and transform.
Prosperity and decline alternate; virtue and vice diverge.
The sun and moon have their cycles of decline;
Cold and heat follow their appointed courses.
Only this Great Dao unifies the seen and unseen,
Extending blessings and rest,
Broadly aiding all beings.

We have early explored the True Secrets, glimpsed the numinous diagrams.
The Three Caverns’ jade cases hold expiatory rites;
The Nine Heavens’ golden decrees transmit protective texts.
For four ten-thousands of kalpas, its teachings have flourished;
For five hundred millions of heavens, it has been venerated—
Subduing demons, summoning spirits,
Assisting the nation in its deeds,
Supporting the perilous and saving all things.
For any supplication made, how could it not be reported to the heavens?

**The Petition’s Words:**
As the words declare, the intent is sincere and devout.
This disciple, still bound by calamity and not yet freed from illness,
Prostrates before the heavens, baring our hearts to the Dao,
Requesting the elevation of this solemn fast,
That numinous power descend to aid us,
That our sincere offerings may meet with celestial favor.

With this late evening ritual, ascending the altar to practice the Dao,
We pray the assembled Daoists to light the first incense strand,
That this incense smoke may ascend directly to heaven,
Offering to the Most High True Dao Treasure.
We, disciples, prostrate body, spirit, and fate.
Relying on the Three Supreme Ones and the Ten-Directional Saints,
May the merit of this incense strand flow to the Emperor’s Nine Temples,
Illuminating the Three Pure Ones, blessing all lands,
Strengthening the august foundation, ensuring eternal prosperity.
We respectfully pray for the Crown Prince and all Princes,
That they may uphold the great enterprise.
And for our ministers and officials,
That they may assist in the wise designs,
With all under heaven in harmony, gathering like clouds and streams.

This incense is now burned; we take refuge in the Great Saints’ Most True Dao Virtue.
After attaining the Dao, we shall eternally preserve heaven’s longevity,
Harmonizing with the True Dao.

With this late evening ritual, ascending the altar to practice the Dao,
We pray the assembled Daoists to light the second incense strand,
That this incense smoke may ascend directly to heaven,
Offering to the Most High True Scripture Treasure.
We, disciples, prostrate body, spirit, and fate.
Relying on the Three Supreme Ones and the Ten-Directional Saints,
May the merit of this incense strand flow to our family’s seven ancestral and nine mystical lineages,
Freeing them from earthly bonds, ascending to celestial paths,
Ceasing all litigation in the netherworld,
Blessing our descendants with auspicious fortune.
The Nine Hells shall witness the radiant compassion;
The Six Realms’ beings shall together attain the realm of virtue.

This incense is now burned; we take refuge in the Scripture Saints’ Most True Dao Virtue.
After attaining the Dao, we shall eternally preserve longevity,
Harmonizing with the True Dao.

With this late evening ritual, ascending the altar to practice the Dao,
We pray the assembled Daoists to light the third incense strand,
That this incense smoke may ascend directly to heaven,
Offering to the Most High True Master Treasure.
We, disciples, prostrate body, spirit, and fate.

With reverence, we take refuge in the Most High Three Sages,
And the Ten Directions’ holy assemblies.
May the merit of this incense strand flow to disciple [name],
Clearing debts and settling grievances,
Dissolving calamities and disasters,
Quelling malevolence and dispelling evil,
Healing sickness and dispelling misfortune,
Extending life through the Southern Dipper’s grace,
And bestowing prosperity through the Eastern Palace’s decree.

Thus extending to all kin and kindred,
And all beings of heaven and earth,
Together sharing in virtuous merit,
All ascending to the Dao’s realm.

Now, with this incense burned, we take refuge in the Teacher-Saints’ Most True Dao Virtue.
After attaining the Dao, we shall eternally preserve peace and well-being,
Harmonizing with the True Dao.

Repentance offered, demonic influences subdued,
Three invocations, three obeisances.
Reaffirming the sacred rank.

With sincerity, we—disciple [name] and the ritual officials—
Humbly present our heartfelt supplication to the Three Pure Ones and Supreme Deities,
The Ten Extremes’ High Immortals,
The Three Realms’ ritual assembly,
And the Two Classes of Arrayed Saints,
Beseeching their boundless compassion to pierce through and illuminate our devotion.

We, disciples, have long worn the sacred texts’ blessings,
Unveiling mysteries profound, striving to propagate virtue,
Establishing merit to benefit all beings.

Disciple [name], burdened by calamities and afflicted by misfortune,
List our transgressions with sincerity, earnestly praying for blessings,
Requesting the ritual’s rectification and the True Ones’ intercession.

Thus, we dare follow the prescribed rites,
Turning the scriptures and practicing the Dao,
Repenting for disciple [name]’s past and present lives,
Deep-seated sins uncountable—
Either defying Heaven and Earth’s nurturing benevolence,
Or failing to honor the Sun and Moon’s illuminating virtue,
Violating the nature of the Two Qi and Five Phases,
Disrupting the harmony of the Three Lights and Six Seasons.

Past grievances unresolved, future sins accumulating,
Taking life recklessly, acting without restraint,
Ignorant of cause and effect, heedless of taboos.
The passions’ stirrings offend both seen and unseen,
The three actions’ deeds transgress sacred teachings.
Thus, we incur retribution, inviting disaster and peril.

Again, we fear provoking Dragon spirits,
Undertaking earthworks and construction,
Encroaching on geomantic harmony,
Or defying the seasons’ natural order.
Again, we fear the influence of celestial portents,
Yearly cycles of misfortune,
The Nine Palaces’ penal influences,
And the Eight Trigrams’ conflicting obstacles.

Sickness and misfortune deepen, danger pressing near—
We dare invoke the ritual, repent our transgressions,
Burn incense and light lamps,
Praying to Heaven and beseeching fate,
That calamities and sins may be absolved,
So that the Primordial One may extend life,
The Three Elements may reverse death,
Spirit-children may administer remedies,
The Great Emperor may descend with talismans,
The Six Ministries may harmonize,
And the Hundred Passages may flow freely,
Bestowing longevity and prosperity,
Extinguishing misfortune and nurturing blessings.

May disciple [name]’s household ascend to the Nine Ancestors’ celestial realm,
With all kin receiving protection,
The Nine Hells and Six Realms’ beings—
All creatures, flying, swimming, or rooted—
Each attaining their rightful place,
All sharing in blessings and fortune.

Above, we pray for the Dragon’s grand design to endure,
Heaven and Earth to last eternally,
Cultural virtue to flourish and martial prowess to resonate far,
The sacred waters bearing virtue, the sun’s brilliance encompassing all.
The Eight Trigrams and Nine Regions shall again shine in the Pure Luo,
Pearls and jade reunite in the Mystic Vault.
The hundred grains shall yield without fail, the three agricultural labors prosper,
No epidemics shall arise, floods and droughts shall not intrude,
Winds and rains shall come in season, arms shall forever rest,
All sentient beings included.

Below, even the spirits of the underworld,
River and mountain officials,
Yin and Yang ministers—
Punishing evil and aiding the righteous,
Propagating the Dao and bringing peace,
Ascending together to the Dao’s shore—
Thus, above we honor the Heavenly Sage’s boundless compassion,
Below we fulfill our disciples’ sincere repentance.

Humbly presented for divine acknowledgment.

The ritual bell is struck; the Twelve Vows are proclaimed.
The Grand Lecture commences; the spirit is focused, incense is burned.
The High Functionary restores the altar.
The Incense Officials and Messengers—
Left and Right Dragon-Tiger Lords,

Shall now command that where disciple [name] has ascended the evening altar to practice the Dao,

Mushrooms and hundred-spirits’ herbs flourish,
And the assembled Immortals gather before this incense burner.

May the Ten Directions’ celestial maidens and immortal youths
Attend to the fragrant smoke,
Transmitting disciple [name]’s sincere supplications
Directly to the Supreme Dao’s Unbounded Extremity,
The Three Pure Ones and Most High Saints,
And the Jade Emperor of the Celestial Vault.

The ritual bell is struck; the hymns are chanted.
Exiting the hall, led to the Six-Curtained Chamber.

*Volume Seven of the Complete Ritual Precepts of the Dao Gate*

**The Ritual of Starry Exorcism for Disaster Elimination**
*Compiled and Edited by Master Guangcheng Du Guangting*

**Opening the Altar and Practicing the Dao**

Conduct the ritual as prescribed. The Grand Master presides, and all disciples observe the precepts in accordance with the Dao.

The High Functionary proclaims the Sacred Exorcism Charm.

**East Direction:**
Nine-*qi* Azure Heaven, the Bright Star Great Deity.
Illuminating the eastern lands, piercing the Nine Gates.
Turning the torch of yang light, sweeping away filth and miasma.
The Radiant Boy, named **Xuanqing**.
Guarding my hall, facing the Celestial Sovereign.
Subduing demons, binding fiends, hunting the wicked horde.
Upholding the True Dao, with crimson script and jade inscriptions.
Nine-Heaven talismans command, seizing the Dragon-Courier’s transmission.
All-under-Heaven pacified—I attain the Flying Immortal,
Harmonizing with the Dao, uniting with the True.

**South Direction:**
Three-*qi* Vermilion Heaven, radiant effulgence flowing.
The Wandering Star turns the torch, piercing the Great Sun.
Above, the Vermilion Pure One, contracting with the Void Sovereign.
The Radiant Boy, named **Huafang**.
Commanding the Fire Soldiers, guarding the Jade Hall.
Severing evil, binding fiends, beheading the demon kings.
What the North Emperor receives, wind and fire cannot withstand.
The flowing bells resound, aiding in the altar’s defense.
The True Dao spreads—who dares to rage?
I enjoy the supreme merit, seated upon the Pole Star’s might.
Eons without end, boundless as Heaven—I harmonize with the Dao, uniting with the True.

**West Direction:**
Seven-*qi* Pure Heaven, the Great White flows its essence.
Illuminating the Golden Gate, piercing the Great Darkness.
Within, the Pure Sovereign, named **Imperial Spirit**.
Guarding the spirit, pacifying my form.
Severing the source of evil, the Kingly Dao made clear.
Palaces in order, the Three Lights aligned.
The Dao unites naturally—I ascend to the Purple Court.
Sacred Talismans bless all beings.
The Primordial Sovereign’s *qi* comes to merge with my body.
Merit surpassing all—Heaven and Earth both at peace.
I harmonize with the Dao, uniting with the True.

**North Direction:**
Five-*qi* Dark Heaven, the Primordial Wandering.
The Star of the Hour shines resplendent, illuminating the Great Microcosm.
The Dark Spirit Venerable Deity, named **Cengwei**.
Commanding the Flying Crown, celestial robes and feathered garments.
Guarding the Five Gates, inspecting and capturing malefactors.
Who dares to trespass—cleaved and shattered.
The Jade Talisman declares, the Eight Sacred Powers.
Evil gates sealed, the True Dao opened.
Reflecting upon my form, the Three Lights shine as one.
Riding the void, floating—my form ascends as an Immortal.
I harmonize with the Dao, uniting with the True.

**Central Direction:**
One-*qi* Yellow Heaven, regulating Heaven and Earth.
Forging yin and yang, commanding the Mysterious True.
The Star of Pacification emits its radiance, flowing through the Nine Heavens.
The Radiant Boy, named **Tianlian**.
The Primordial *qi*, yang essence—flames rise as crimson smoke.
Piercing all under Heaven, and my disciples’ bodies.
A hundred evils crushed, ten thousand ghosts slain.
The Central Mountain’s spell—all under Heaven obeys.
The Five Spirits pacified—I fly as a High Immortal.
I harmonize with the Dao, uniting with the True.

The Grand Master raises the ritual drum **twenty-four times**.
The High Functionary ignites the furnace.

**Invocation of the Supreme Three-Heaven Primordial Three-*qi*,
The Most High Dao Sovereign,**
Commanding forth from within my body the **Three Five Functionaries**,
Left and Right Officials, Left and Right Incense-Bearers,
Dragon-Courier Mounted Attendants, Incense-Bearing Golden Boys,

I, your humble disciple, having fasted and offered sincere supplications,

My heartfelt sincerity is fully recorded in the petition.

With today’s invocation of the altar and arrangement of positions,
All offerings displayed, the assembly solemn and without disturbance,
The True Ritual performed with solemnity—
The celestial omens align, auspicious clouds gather.
With utmost devotion, my sincerity ascends to the highest realms.
May all above and below Heaven hear and know.

「May the **Supreme Dao/Way of the Most High and Ultimate Truth** descend with its **mystic light of spiritual treasure** and **enlightened radiance**,

The **Three Pure Ones of Supreme Holiness**, and the **Celestial Gate of Golden Threshold—Jade Emperor, the Most High Sovereign** before whom they reside.

**All assembled officials** now convene, and I humbly request the **proclamation of sacred ranks**.

The **Supreme Saints of the Ten Directions**, the **Three Realms of responsive virtue**,

Your humble disciple hears that Heaven does not favor those lacking **virtue/power**,

The **virtuous** do not revere those without **proper ritual conduct**,

Only through the utmost devotion to **sincerity and ritual** can one receive the **presence of the True Saints**.
Moreover, the **Three Talismans of the Yellow Talisman Ritual** are honored,

Now, with reverence, I purify the **hidden halls of the sacred grove**,

Flags flutter with **celestial winds**, summoning the **true qi of the Five Directions**;
Swords strike across the **Northern Dipper**, cleansing **thousand-li demons and malevolent influences**.

Incense burns fragrant, rising in **pious smoke**;
The **sacred drum** resounds, its **clear and resonant** tones echoing.
With **solemn discipline**, we commence this **great ritual**,
And exhort the **unified resolve** of all participants.

We recite the **hymns of the Celestial Caverns**,
And invoke the **high and exalted** **Supreme Saints** to descend.
We **spread out the sacred space** in accordance with the **fasting rules**,
And **purify through repentance**, washing away the **roots of sin**.

Humbly, we pray that all **sincere and distant** voices be heard,
That the **Emperor’s heart** descend in response,
And that the **manifest form** of his grace be abundantly shown,
Piercing our **ultimate sincerity**.

First, we dispatch the **True Officials overseeing the fast and ritual**,
The **Celestial Maidens attending scriptures and incense**,
The **Transmitting Speech Jade Maidens**,
The **Golden Boys presenting petitions**,
To come and **temple at this spotless field**,
Together leading our **heartfelt prayers**,
To **verify the ritual** and **fulfill our wishes** in harmony.

Then, **jade and feathered spirits** gather in flight,
And the **cranes rest in pairs** beneath the **still night**;
**Emerald banners** are raised in all directions,
And the **sacred chariots of jade** spread across the **layered heavens**.
Some ride upon **transcendent beasts of celestial birth**,
Others drive **heavenly steeds of flying clouds**—
In **swirling multitude**, they descend to this solemn assembly.
How dare we not **reverently accept** their presence,
And **awaken this mystical response**,
So that they may **ascend before the Ultimate Dao/Way of Boundless Truth**!

**Know the sacred bell is struck**,
And **rise in respectful praise**.
**Chant the Ten Directions**!

When the **rites are complete**, all **prolong kneeling** in **repentance and submission**,
Your humble disciple and the **ritual participants**,
